title: LinkedIn 出左份工，小米請Sales Manager, 好冇去試下？

replies.msg:
職務內容
Responsibilities:

Keep track of market trend of handsets and various technology gadgets
Maintain good relationships with carriers, retailers and distributors
Regular meetings with clients on new product information and sales review
Identify and develop new business opportunities
Review client materials and display to meet company standard
Review and provide insights on sales, inventory and other adhoc reports
Identify risks and work with multiple teams (local and remote teams) to ensure various dependencies are met to smooth product launch and daily operation flow

Requirement:

Bachelor Degree Holder in any discipline
3 years or above B2B sales experience in telecom and/or technology product industry
Able work with dynamic environment
Fluent in English, Cantonese and Mandarin (spoken and written)
Self-motivated, sales oriented and independent
Able to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines
Candidate will less experiences will be considered as Assistant Sales Manager
